title: The vinyl man cometh
body:
I just picked up the window banners / covers / plugs from the custom vinyl shop. They look grrrrreat! Next on the list: head down to the theater, clean the windows like they've never been cleaned before, introduce the window banners / covers / plugs into their new homes, and start painting the air ducts. 

Progress... it feels SO good.
author: Dan

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body:
you know what else feels good...
swimming in a pool full of chilled jello

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: Which design did you decide on? Have we seen it? Or is it completely NEW?! Or are you not telling...

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: It's completely new... the design never showed its face on the blog. It's much simpler and clean than the others, so I hope everyone likes it.

comments.author: Dave Adams
comments.body:
Sorry Dan. I can't believe you didn't run it by us. I'm afraid I can no longer support the Moxie.






*giggles*

comments.author: Maddy
comments.body: Well then, I think a phlog is in order.  Otherwise, I might drive by the cinema and not recognize it.

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Ooooo...can't wait to check it out...

comments.author: DUG
comments.body: Did a lady happen to drive by, point a phone and say "I still know what you look like!"?

comments.author: Dave Adams
comments.body: I saw the panels today. They look great!
